title: How do I leave a club?
body: The updated client confuses me. How do I leave a club? I tried clicking the settings button in the top right corner of a club chat but it wont open.

replies.body: idk clubs dont appear to be showing up in the new client. but maybe try to do the same as legacy client?

Club features are not in the settings options of club chat, but actually its own section of the client.  Select your profile, and you should find a pane for clubs.  Selecting your club should open a drop down menu with an option to leave.  Hope that helps!
